name: Christmas Cooking Games - Kids Game (Girls & Boys)
name_original: Christmas Cooking Games - Kids Game (Girls & Boys)
description:
Help Santa and the Unicorn in this amazing cooking & baking adventure with so much cooking fun! Create & decorate lots of fun dessert including cakes, cookies, cake pops, reindeer pancakes, rainbow slushy, colorful candy treats, slime and more!

Level 1: Create the best gingerbread house!! Come decorate using different color frosting (chocolate, rainbow and vanilla), add peppermint candies, candy canes and much more!

Level 2: Make your own holiday cookies! First use the fan to cool down the hot cookies. Then cut out the cookie shapes with the cookie cutter, add toppings, sprinkles and fun Christmas designs!

Level 3: Amazing reindeer pancakes salon! Put a large and small pancake to make the shape. Then add bacon, chocolate, syrup and more!

Level 4: Eat the gingerbread man! Decorate and place the hat, candies and more! Then it's time to eat!! Yummy!

Level 5: Delicious cake-pops salon! Decorate cake pops with the best holiday designs including Santa, penguin, present and more!!

Level 6: Wow! Rainbow Frozen Slushy time! Choose your cup, straw and design. Then add the slushy flavors.

Level 7: It's cold outside and you need hot chocolate! Add marshmallows, candy and much more! Decorate the mug and don't forget to cool off the steaming hot chocolate!!

Level 8: Santa's Ice Cream Sundae time! Create the best holiday sundae, add chocolate syrup, whipped cream and a cherry on top!

Level 9: Help Santa at the bakery! Create the best Christmas cake mix. Place the bowl, add ingredients and stir them together!!

Level 10: It's time to decorate the Christmas Cake!! Add frosting, decorations and candles! Merry Christmas!!

Level 11: It's time for the unicorn rainbow cake salon! Add the unicorn horn, rainbow frosting, candy and much more!

Level 12: Create the best slime! Add the slime ingredients like shaving cream & sparkles, then stir together for the coolest sparkle slime!!

Level 13: Rainbow unicorn princess donuts! Create tasty donuts then decorate with rainbow sprinkles, candy, syrups and much more!!

*Level 14: Eat the best rainbow unicorn cake!! First, decorate with chocolate syrup, rainbow frosting, yummy candy, unicorn horn and more! Then take a bite to see the rainbow surprise inside!!

*Level 15: Make the best rainbow unicorn cake-pops! The new cake pops are fresh out of the hot oven. It's time to make the best rainbow unicorn and heart designs!

*Level 16: Create a rainbow unicorn smoothie!! Use the tastiest flavors and add unicorn designs to make the best rainbow smoothie!

*Level 17: Mmmm...Rainbow Grilled Cheese?! Decorate the best grilled cheese, add the plate, add unicorn decorations and rainbow fries!!

*Level 18: A new rainbow ice cream salon! Use rainbow ice cream, add a cookie and top with the best flavors!!

*Level 19: Rainbow cookies salon! Make new shape cookies including rainbow, unicorn and princess!! Then finish by decorating with cool frosting designs!! Don't forget to add the perfect plate and sprinkles!!

*Level 20: A magical rainbow unicorn pizza cake!! Add yummy cotton candy, sprinkles rainbow mints and more! Use the red coloring for a sauce and green candy frosting for the toppings! Have fun!!

*Please note that Unicorn Cooking Christmas Food is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items and remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*
